DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate recently develop non-invasive infrared thermal camera call Diabetic Foot Ulcer Prevention System ( DFUPS ) clinical set study healthy volunteer .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 18 year old 2 . Has history diabetes 3 . Has previous history foot ulceration 4 . Has previous history foot surgery 5 . Has palpable foot pulse foot ( palpable posterior tibial artery pulse OR dorsalis pedis artery pulse OR ) 6 . Has history peripheral neuropathy 7 . Has history peripheral arterial disease 8 . Must able provide meaningful write informed consent study 1 . Has active foot ulceration infection 2 . Has foot deformity opinion Investigator , would interfere interpret result study 3 . Has uncontrolled illness , opinion Investigator , would interfere interpret result study 4 . Has implantable electronic device 5 . Is age < 18
